dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I think she has a great idea! I mean if we won’t get caught then what the hell?

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: Ah I’m so happy you agree! Okay first things first let me just make a call to one of my minions to make sure nobody disturbs us.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: This is really happening! I can’t believe how lucky I am right now!

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: Lucci made a phone call and she was chatting for what looked like a few minutes, before she turned around and walked back in a huff.

dialogue.name: Lucci
dialogue.dialogueText: Turns out that we can’t do it today, because apparently the head of my minions is on vacation today.

dialogue.name: Takeshi
dialogue.dialogueText: I stared at Lucci who was pouting like a spoilt child, and to be honest she was surprisingly cute.
